result.name: tenancy-deposit-scheme
result.notes: Registers instances where short hold tenancy deposits have been paid to holding organisation

organization.name: homes-and-communities-agency
organization.title: Homes England
organization.description:
Homes England (formerly The Homes and Communities Agency) is the national housing and regeneration agency for England. It is the regulator of social housing providers and works with local partners to create new affordable homes and thriving neighbourhoods.

Homes England is an executive non-departmental public body, sponsored by the Ministry of Housing, Communities & Local Government.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/homes-england

result.title: Tenancy Deposit Scheme

extras.value: Release would be dependent on establishing an appropriate way of removing personal information whilst retaining data integrity
